actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to provide for public representation on any multi-State power organization.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Power Act, that any regional reliability council or other organization which regulates the voluntary interconnection and coordination of facilities for the generation, transmission, and sale of electric energy shall provide for the public to be represented in such organization by a non-voting public member from each State in which facilities affected by such interconnection and coordination are located.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to provide for public representation on any multi-State power organization.
